detail_desc: Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and buttons at the top. Long raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and a gathered seam above the hem to add a little extra width to the skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Playsuit in a viscose and cotton weave with wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch pockets with a flap at the top, side pockets and back pockets. Seam at the waist with a soft, detachable belt with a large plastic buckle at the front. Wide legs with pleats at the top.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scalloped cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in jersey with a low waist, wide elastic waistband and lined gusset.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Set with a top and tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey. Top with short puff sleeves and a print motif on the front. Skirt with an elastic waistband.
Skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with flounced tiers and covered elastication at the waist.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Knee-socks in a fine-knit cotton blend.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, fine knit with buttons on one shoulder and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and a ribbed trim along one side.
Court shoes with pointed toes and open sides with narrow straps and an adjustable metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck, sewn in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. 3/4-length dolman sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a flared skirt with a gathered tier at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Shorts in a soft, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the back of the waist, decorative tabs with a button at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with stripes and a text motif down the sides and narrow hems.
Skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and pleats at the sides.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a seam at the waist with a bow, and a glittery tulle skirt.
Mesh and lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back. 90% of the polyamide is recycled.
Suede ballet pumps with a bow on the front and an elastic strap over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and textured soles.
Brazilian briefs in jersey made from a modal blend with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in softly draping silk crêpe with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and a lace trim at the neckline.

Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with an extended waistband and button, pleats at the top and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Lace negligee with a super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringe trims on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Dress in a fine-knit, extra-soft cotton blend with a rounded collar in a broderie anglaise cotton weave. Opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip, and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and patch pockets with a button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and a button at the cuffs. Lined.
Shirt in woven fabric with appliqués on the collar, concealed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in creases at the front. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and elasticated waist.
Short necklace in different designs of thin metal chains. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm.
Joggers in soft velour with a ribbed drawstring waist, appliqué at the top and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft pile with a reversible sequin motif (size 1½-2Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Yoga socks with elastic straps that cross over the feet and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button at the waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Long nightshirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with notch lapels, an open chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Fitted, knee-length, sleeveless dress in a stretch weave with a round neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a close-fitting skirt with decorative buttons and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button at the waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Short running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pocket with a concealed zip and reflective details. Lined.
Skirt in a viscose weave with a smocked waist and broderie anglaise at the hem. Unlined.

Longer-style hoodie in soft, thermal faux shearling with flatlock seams and a zip at the top with a chin guard. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Decorative seams on the back pockets and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Short, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and long sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow ties with metal rings at the back and back of the neck.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in airy viscose jersey with gathers at the top and a concealed zip in one side.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
